links.title: The best streaming video player to buy right now
links.description: So you've decided to buy a 4K streaming player. Maybe the built-in apps on your TV are laggy, or you don't have all the ones you'd like. Between Roku, Amazon, and Apple, there are many good options. But there are clear standout winners.

links.title: Hackers Attacked iOS Users with an Ad Campaign - UTB Blogs
links.description: Users in the United States who use iOS (iPhone) were the victims of hacker attacks when they were directed to adult advertisements and those who, if pressed, would fall into phishing. The attackers have managed to hijack 300 browsers in the last 48 hours.

links.title: What the Stock Selloff Tells Us About the Future of Tech
links.description: The past three months have not been kind to large public technology companies. Amid crescendos of criticism about monopolistic power, these companies saw their market value plummet. The rampant selling has leveled off, at least for the moment, so it's an opportune time to ask: What comes next?

links.title: Stock Market Wrap week ending 11/30/18 by Dr J at 11: THE CALL
links.description: Dr J brags about yet another spectacular call that he made Monday and Tuesday involving the Dow, S&P, Amazon, Netflix and Apple. He also examines the charts of Cronos and Viking therapeutics. Dr J is bullish on the market and was bullish when most others were looking for the cellars to take cover.
